content: off all sts using italian bind off #poetscardigan © allison schmidt @allisonmarieknits 8 cables 2st right cable 2st left cable 4st right cable 4st left cable 6st braid 6st flat braid for all cables for all charts knit starting from the bottom of the chart and reading from right to left on rs row and from left to right on ws row when you complete a chart start over from row 1 #poetscardigan © allison schmidt @allisonmarieknits 9 28 st diamond #poetscardigan © allison schmidt @allisonmarieknits 10 thank you for knitting i hope you enjoyed making your poets cardigan let s stay friends you can find me online instagram @allisonmarieknits youtube https //www youtube com/@allisonmarieknits ravelry allisonmarieknits #poetscardigan © allison schmidt @allisonmarieknits
